{
	/// <content>
	/// Contains generated async methods
	/// </content>
	public partial interface ITestInteraface
	{
		Task ReadAsync();

		Task<bool> WriteAsync(string content);
	}


	/// <content>
	/// Contains generated async methods
	/// </content>
	public abstract partial class AbstractTest : ITestInteraface
	{
		public virtual Task ReadAsync()
		{
			return Task.CompletedTask;
		}

		public abstract Task<bool> WriteAsync(string content);
	}

	/// <content>
	/// Contains generated async methods
	/// </content>
	public partial class TestCase : AbstractTest
	{
		public override Task ReadAsync()
		{
			return Task.CompletedTask;
		}

		public override Task<bool> WriteAsync(string content)
		{
			try
			{
				return Task.FromResult<bool>(SimpleFile.Write(content));
			}
			catch (Exception ex)
			{
				return Task.FromException<bool>(ex);
			}
		}
	}
}
